comment/reply:
it depicts the grail war with the most interesting mindsets of a master. you have a serial killer who isn't psychotic but simply brutal, and has emotional range as he is enamored with blood and gore. you have kotomine trying to find what drives him, and kirei being exposed to the fact that his wish for peace is impossible. and to top it all off, saber is shown to be the most incompetent king out of all the heroic spirits because she refused to teach her subjects how to lead, taking all the responsibility upon herself, so her presence became a necessity to them. 

zero does it all with a more ruthless tone than any other fate before or after it.
